segments.text: I've come about your wools . According to our market survey , wools are likely to find a ready market in our country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wonderful ! We can meet your requirements and the offer is ready for you . Here it is . The unit price is USD 15.00 per kilogram .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you quote CIF or FOB ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you quote the price of CIF Hamburg ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , that's easy . We will work out our CIF offer this evening . Could you come again tomorrow , say , at 10 AM ?
segments.speaker: S2
